title: The Secret of First-Half Lines, Against the Spread MVPs, and Week 10 Teasers | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We recap the Colts-Titans 'Thursday Night Football' game (2:00), discuss the secret of betting first-half lines, review the best and worst teams against the spread at the midway point in the season (20:00), and break down several potential games to tease, including the Rams vs. Seahawks, Dolphins vs. Chargers, Cardinals vs. Bills, Texans vs. Browns, and Vikings vs. Bears (36:00).
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
